title: Energy Roll On Aromatherapy
description: Revitalize your energy with Sanatura's 100% natural, hand-made in HK Energy Roll-On Aromatherapy, infused with energizing essential oils. Perfect for on-the-go use & reducing fatigue.
cleaned_text: Roll-On Aromatherapy is a 100% natural, hand-made essential oil roll on crafted in Hong Kong to provide an energy boost whenever you need it without the use of caffeine. Our Energy roll-on aromatherapy is infused with Fractionated Coconut Oil and a blend of energizing essential oils sourced from England, including Lemongrass, Rose Geranium, Patchouli, Frankincense, and Bergamot, this uplifting essential oil roll-on offers a variety of benefits such as - reducing fatigue - providing a pick-me-up when feeling tired - enhancing focus and energy levels. Its compact size makes it perfect for keeping in your pocket, making it easy to use throughout the day for a quick energy boost, whether you're at work, home, or on-the-go. Additionally, it can also help with stress and anxiety. Key Functions & Benefits All the essential oils in this Energy aromatherapy roll on are hand-picked to provide an energy boost and focus. Improve energy and fight fatigue: Lemongrass can improve energy and build up resistance to fatigue. Lemongrass and Bergamot induces a revitalizing process, good for boredom and tiredness. Enhance wellbeing and relieve anxiety: Rose Geranium is balancing and uplifting. It can help reduce restlessness and help to treat anxiety. Patchouli can act as an antidepressant, and is useful for treating exhaustion, stress and anxiety. Calming: Frankincense can lift your spirits, increase energy and focus, and aid meditation. It's ideal when feeling stressed, tired or overwhelmed. Directions & Dosage Apply to pulse points - temple, wrists and desired spots. Reapply as needed. Ingredients Fractionated Coconut Oil, Bergamot (Bergaptene Free), Lemongrass, Rose Geranium, Patchouli, Frankincense, Vitamin Lemongrass Middle: Rose Geranium Base: Patchouli, Frankincense Research & Studies Bergamot for stress and fatigue: According to a small 2015 [study ](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25824404/)on Japanese women, Anxiety was decreased by inhaling bergamot oil mixed with water vapor. According to a 2013 [study](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23531112/), aromatherapy using bergamot (together with other essential oils) can treat depression, anxiety, and other mood disorders by inducing the release of dopamine and serotonin in the brain. Lemongrass for stress and anxiety: Stress is frequently accompanied by high blood pressure. Aromatherapy has been proven to reduce tension and anxiety in numerous studies. Combined with massage, it may provide additional benefits. The effects of lemongrass and sweet almond massage oil were examined in a 2015 [study](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/278411223_Physiological_and_Psychological_Effects_of_Lemongrass_and_Sweet_Almond_Massage_Oil). Compared to the control group, study participants who had a massage with the oil once a week for three weeks saw reduced diastolic blood pressure. Both the pulse rate and systolic blood pressure were unaffected. Rose Geranium for anxiety The use of essential oils was introduced to women in distress during labor in a [study](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4484988/). The group who used Rose Geranium essential oil were found to have less anxiety after inhalation. Patchouli for anxiety and fatigue: A [study ](https://www.liebertpub.com/doi/10.1089/acm.2020.0206#:~:text=Patchouli%20oil%20has%20also%20been,and%20reduce%20depression%20and%20stress.)was conducted to investigate the effects of Patchouli when inhaled by a group of nurses. The results showed that compassion fatigue and level of stress was significantly lower. Frankincense for stress: In a recent [experiment](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31582666/), adult male rats who were sleep-deprived were given frankincense essential oil (EO) to see how it affected their sleep patterns. When frankincense essential oil was applied topically in diluted (1:10 with jojoba oil) and undiluted formulations, decreased levels of the stress markers corticosterone and glutathione were found in the sleep-deprived rats. Storage Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight. Product information What essential oils do we use? Lemongrass Lemongrass helps you to feel revitalized and maintain energy throughout the day, preventing boredom and chronic fatigue. Rose Geranium Rose Geranium creates balance between the mind and body, helping you to relax and elevate your mood. Patchouli Patchouli serves as an effective antidepressant which treats symptoms of stress and anxiety. Bergamot Bergamot helps to uplift your mood, reducing anxiety and stress levels. How to use the roll on? A roll-on is a quick and easy way to enjoy the benefits of aromatherapy and essential oils.
